title: Modern Wave
content:
![Modern Wave](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415034018im_/http:/farm9.staticflickr.com/8228/8600447600_42dbe225f0.jpg)

Ornamental font, based on samples of Alphonse Mucha, who was an Art Nouveau painter and decorative artist. In this collection assembled typical wavy shape secession.

[On MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415034018/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/2d-typo/modern-wave/)

![Modern Wave](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415034018im_/http:/farm9.staticflickr.com/8509/8599351543_c84d04dbe1.jpg)

![Modern Wave](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415034018im_/http:/farm9.staticflickr.com/8099/8599338231_8b5bf2e31b.jpg)
author: Lukas_
